title: An Act amending death and disability compensation for members of the armed forces and the organized militia of the Commonwealth

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Xiarhos of Barnstable, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3890) of Steven George Xiarhos relative to amending death and disability compensation for members of the armed forces and the organized militia of the Commonwealth.  Veterans and Federal Affairs.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Veterans and Federal Affairs

related_entities.name: committee on Veterans and Federal Affairs

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/28/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2

Hearing rescheduled to 10/28/2025 from 01:00 PM-01:10 PM in A-2                                                                                                                                                                        and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
